import React from "react" import { Flex, Text, Box, Button, Row, Column } from "rebass" import Table, { TableLine, ProductInfo } from "./base-table" import ShowStyle from "../show-style" import InputNumber from "../number-input" export default props => { return ( {props.channelList.map((channel, index) => ( {index} {channel.code} CLICK TO VIEW ))} {/* 02 A CLICK TO VIEW 02 A CLICK TO VIEW */}
) }
